title: Exploring the potential of Hermetia illucens larvae extracts: A promising approach for dermocosmetic formulations
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Márcia Santos Filipe, Rossana V.C. Cardoso, Manuel Ayuso, Daniel Murta, Ana María Díaz-Lanza, Catarina Rosado, Tânia C.S.P Pires, Ricardo C. Calhelha, Patricia Rijo
